display_long_description:
A derelict Space Station containing hazardous research and technology has become the target of attack by hostile forces that appear to be the plundering the vessel.

You, an augmented super soldier from a by-gone era have been re-activated after a long period inactivity under emergency protocols to assist in the defense and repair of the station.

It is unknown what happened to the original crew or what the effects of long term cryogenic suspension are. But one thing is for sure, you still know how to neutralize any hostile with extreme lethality.

Not all is as it seems onboard the classified and forgotten facility.

A short single-player experience.

VR FPS with Point to Teleport and Orient movement , designed for comfort with minimal motion sickness, standing or sitting.

Oracle was created under certain "Game Content Usage Rules", and is a derivative work. See the notice on our website for more info.
